replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
给予玩家
essentials.silentjoin
essentials.silentquit
两条权限

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content: 你把"none"改了就会自动替换掉加入退出的消息

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
如果设置为allow-silent-join-quit: true

再给
essentials.silentjoin
essentials.silentquit
才会静音加入

开启允许拥有其权限的玩家静音加入：allow-silent-join-quit:true
将想要让其无提示加入以及推出服务器的玩家或者是权限组给予以下权限
essentials.silentjoin
essentials.silentquit
